properties.description: Creation of a view of organisation unit for PBI Reports

source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_hr_protected_data

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
	T1.IngestionDate AS [PC_Date],
    month(T1.IngestionDate) AS [PC Month],
      ,[month_int]
      ,[PC Month Latest]
      ,[MonthYearLatest_SortKey]
      ,[PC Year]
      ,[PC FY]
      ,[PC FY Latest]
      ,[FY-Latest_SortKey]
      ,[Ref Number]
      --Columns replaced by columns below
      --,[Disabled]
      --,[Ethnicity]
      --,[Religion]
      --,[Sexual Orientation]
      ,[PC Headcount]
      ,[Data Completeness]
      ,[Disability group]
      ,[Ethnicity group]
      ,[Religion group]
      ,[Sexual Orientation group]
      ,'PINS' as source
      ,'N/A' as responsibility_level
      ,NULL as Sex
      ,NULL as [Age Band]

FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_secure_info_fact T1
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_disability_dim T2 ON T1.DisabilityID = T2.DisabilityID and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_diversity_dim T3 ON T1.DiversityID = T3.DiversityID and T3.IsActive = 'Y'
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_religion_dim T4 ON T1.ReligionID = T4.ReligionID and T4.IsActive = 'Y'
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_sxo_dim T5 ON T1.SXOID = T5.SXOID and T5.IsActive = 'Y'
	FULL JOIN default.calendar_dim_plus T10 ON T1.IngestionDate = T10.CalendarDate

WHERE T1.IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql


WITH Dates
AS
(
SELECT DISTINCT
 REPLACE(RIGHT(replace(file_name,'.xlsx',''),7),'_','-')+'-01' AS Dt
FROM SAP_HR.Protected_Data
)
,MinMaxDates AS
(
SELECT MIN(Dt) AS StartDate
	  ,MAX(Dt) AS EndDate
FROM Dates
)
,dimDate
AS
(
	SELECT [date] 
		  ,month_name
		  ,month_int
		  ,[Month-Year Latest] AS [Month Latest]
		  ,CASE WHEN [Month-Year] = [Month-Year Latest] THEN SortKey*-1
		   ELSE -999999
		   END AS [MonthYearLatest_SortKey]
		  ,year_int AS [Year]
		  ,financial_year AS [FY]
		  ,CASE WHEN FY_Calc = 'Current' THEN 'Latest'
		   ELSE 'FY-' + CAST(RIGHT(financial_year,2) AS varchar)
		   END AS [FY Latest]
		  ,CASE WHEN FY_Calc = 'Current' THEN 2099
		   ELSE financial_year
		   END AS [FY-latest_SortKey]
	FROM
	(
		select
		[date]
		,month_name
		,month_int
		,year_int
		,case when month([date])>3 and year([date]) = year([date]) then year([date]) 
			when month([date])<=3 and year([date]) = year([date])+1 then year([date])
			when month([date])>3 and year([date]) = year([date])-1 then year([date])-1 
			when month([date])<=3 and year([date]) = year([date]) then year([date])-1
		end as financial_year
		,case when CAST(GETDATE() as date) >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()),04,01) THEN
						case when month([date])>3 and year([date]) = year(getdate()) then 'Current'
								when month([date])<=3 and year([date]) = year(getdate())+1 then 'Current'
								when month([date])>3 and year([date]) = year(getdate())-1 then 'Previous'
								when month([date])<=3 and year([date]) = year(getdate()) then 'Previous'
							else null
						end
				  when CAST(GETDATE() as date) >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE())-1,04,01) THEN
						 case when month([date])>3 and year([date]) = year(getdate())-1 then 'Current'
								when month([date])<=3 and year([date]) = year(getdate()) then 'Current'
								when month([date])>3 and year([date]) = year(getdate())-2 then 'Previous'
								when month([date])<=3 and year([date]) = year(getdate())-1 then 'Previous'
							else null
						end 
			end as FY_Calc
		,FORMAT([date],'yyyyMM') AS SortKey
		,CONCAT(month_name,' - ',RIGHT(year_int,2)) AS [Month-Year]
		,CASE WHEN first_of_month = DATEADD(M,-1,DATEADD(D,1,EOMONTH((select EndDate FROM MinMaxDates),0))) THEN 'Latest'
			ELSE CONCAT(month_name,' - ',RIGHT(year_int,2)) 
		END AS [Month-Year Latest]
	from live.dim_date
	where date IN (select dt FROM Dates)
	--between (select StartDate from MinMaxDates) and (select EndDate from MinMaxDates)
	)a
)
,Final
AS
(
	SELECT 
		   CAST(b.date AS date) AS [PC Date]
		  ,b.month_name AS [PC Month]
		  ,b.month_int
		  ,b.[Month Latest] AS [PC Month Latest]
		  ,b.MonthYearLatest_SortKey
		  ,b.Year AS [PC Year]
		  ,b.FY AS [PC FY]
		  ,b.[FY Latest] AS [PC FY Latest]
		  ,b.[FY-Latest_SortKey] 
		  ,a.[Ref Number]
		  ,[Disability Text]
		  ,CASE WHEN [Disability Text] IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
				WHEN [Disability Text] = 'DISABLED' THEN 'Yes'
				WHEN [Disability Text] = 'NOT DISABLED' THEN 'No'
				WHEN [Disability Text] IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose') THEN 'Unknown'
			END AS [Disabled]
		, case [Disability Text]
		when 'PREFER NOT TO SAY' then 'Undeclared'
		when 'DISABLED' then 'Disabled'
		when 'NOT DISABLED' then 'Not Disabled'
		else 'Not reported'
	  end as [Disability group]
		  ,[Ethnic origin]
		  ,CASE WHEN [Ethnic origin] IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
				WHEN [Ethnic origin] LIKE 'White%' THEN 'White'
				WHEN [Ethnic origin] IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown') THEN 'Unknown'
		   ELSE 'BME'
		   END AS [Ethnicity],
		   case [Ethnic origin]
		when 'Asian - Bangladeshi' then 'Asian'
		when 'Asian - Indian' then 'Asian'
		when 'Asian - Other' then 'Asian'
		when 'Asian - Pakistani' then 'Asian'
		when 'Black - African' then 'Black'
		when 'Black - Caribbean' then 'Black'
		when 'Chinese' then 'Chinese'
		when 'Do not wish to disclose' then 'Not declared'
		when 'Mixed - Other' then 'Mixed'
		when 'Mixed - White & Asian' then 'Mixed'
		when 'Mixed - White & Black African' then 'Mixed'
		when 'Mixed - White & Black Caribbean' then 'Mixed'
		when 'Other' then 'Other ethnicity'
		when 'Unknown' then 'Not reported'
		when 'White - Any Background' then 'White'
		when 'White - British' then 'White'
		when 'White - Irish' then 'White'
		when 'White - Other' then 'White'
		when 'White - Any Other Background' then 'White'
		else 'Not reported'
	end as [Ethnicity group]
		 ,[Religious Denomination Key]
		 ,CASE WHEN [Religious Denomination Key] IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
			   WHEN [Religious Denomination Key] IN ('None','Agnostic / Atheist') OR LEFT([Religious Denomination Key],3) IN ('ath','agn') THEN 'Agnostic / Atheist'
			   WHEN [Religious Denomination Key] = 'Christian' THEN 'Christian'
			   WHEN [Religious Denomination Key] IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown') THEN 'Unknown'
		   ELSE 'Other Religion'
		   END AS [Religion]
		, case [Religious Denomination Key]
		when 'Agnostic' then 'No religion'
		when 'Atheist' then 'No religion'
		when 'Buddhist' then 'Buddhist'
		when 'Christian' then 'Christian'
		when 'Do not wish to disclose' then 'Not declared'
		when 'Hindu' then 'Hindu'
		when 'Jewish' then 'Jewish'
		when 'Muslim' then 'Muslim'
		when 'None' then 'No religion'
		when 'Other (please specify)' then 'Any other religion'
		when 'Sikh' then 'Sikh'
		else 'Not reported'
	  end as [Religion group]
		 ,SxO
		 ,CASE WHEN SxO IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
			   WHEN SxO ='Heterosexual' THEN 'Heterosexual'
			   WHEN LEFT(SxO,3) IN ('Gay','Les','Bis') THEN 'LGBT'
			   WHEN SxO IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown','Other') THEN 'Unknown'
		   ELSE 'Other'
		   END AS [Sexual Orientation]
		 ,case [SxO]
		when 'Bisexual' then 'Bisexual'
		when 'Gay Man' then 'Lesbian / Gay'
		when 'Heterosexual' then 'Hetero / Straight'
		when 'Lesbian' then 'Lesbian / Gay'
		when 'Not disclosed' then 'Undeclared'
		when 'Other' then 'Other'
		else 'Not reported'
	  end as [Sexual Orientation group]
	FROM sap_hr.protected_data a
	LEFT OUTER JOIN dimDate b
	ON REPLACE(RIGHT(replace(a.file_name,'.xlsx',''),7),'_','-')+'-01'  = b.date
)
SELECT *
      ,1 AS [PC Headcount]
	  ,CASE WHEN [Disabled] IN ('No Record','Unknown') THEN 'No Record or Data not supplied for one or more categories.'
	  	    WHEN Ethnicity IN ('No Record','Unknown') THEN 'No Record or Data not supplied for one or more categories.'
			WHEN Religion IN ('No Record','Unknown') THEN 'No Record or Data not supplied for one or more categories.'
			WHEN [Sexual Orientation] IN ('No Record','Unknown') THEN 'No Record or Data not supplied for one or more categories.'
	   ELSE 'Records Complete'
	   END AS [Data Completeness] 
FROM Final
GO
